items.text_for_match: 'We can never do too much' - Slot wants football to do more against racism Liverpool head coach Arne Slot says "we should always try to do more" after Real Madrid's Vinicius Jr allegedly received racist abuse from Benfica's Gianluca Prestianni in the first leg of their Champions League play-off tie.
